subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Thomas Bjorn blew a three-shot lead with four holes to play in the 2003 British Open at Royal St. George’s, but jumped to a tie for the first-round lead on Thursday.
snippet: Thomas Bjorn blew a three-shot lead with four holes to play in the 2003 British Open at Royal St. George’s, but jumped to a tie for the first-round lead on Thursday.
